ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard's Guild on Povar
ygData.msgSnippet: ... *grin* ... Well, the casters don t mind. I see nothing wrong with a group that has three bards, one healer and two boomers. The bards tank, with one
ygData.messageBody:
> I would imagine that they have a very close alliance with the
> all-necro
> guild and the all-clerics-who-do-resses guild. <eg>

*grin*

> In my experience, 2 bards in one hunting - not ressing -
> party was a waste
> of a slot. And 3 bards in a hunting party meant certain
> death. With 4 bards,
> I would simply /shudder but have never had that experience.

Well, the casters don't mind. I see nothing wrong with a group that has
three bards, one healer and two boomers. The bards tank, with one singing a
few songs while the other two just sing clarity.

There is an old National Lampoon cartoon about a planet where there were
like 17 sexes instead of two. The cartoon follows this group as they go
through hell and high water to have a one night stand. A scenario lived
nightly by those in EQ trying to build the perfect group *smile*


> p.s.s. "I would not want to join any club that would have me
> for a member."
> (was that W.C. Fields or Groucho Marx?)

Groucho on being invited into some hollywood organization (RL, not a movie I
think) "I don't want to join any organization that would have me as a
member."


Tszaaz


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
